title: Referral System Documentation
subtitle: Integration Guide for 100 Million to Everyone

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: The 100 Million to Everyone referral system allows you to integrate our Lana game and profile creation into your website or app. Users who complete the game on your referral will be redirected back to your specified URL with their new Lana NOSTR profile data.

returnUrl.name: return_url
returnUrl.description: The URL where users will be redirected after completing their profile

siteName.name: site_name
siteName.description: Custom name for your site (will be displayed to users)

steps.step4: 4. User is redirected to your return_url
steps.step5: 5. Profile data is available in the URL

returnData.title: Return Data Structure
returnData.description: When users complete their profile, they'll be redirected to your return_url with the following query parameters:

fields.success: Boolean indicating if profile creation was successful
fields.profileData: Base64 encoded JSON with profile information

security.title: Security Features
security.urlValidation: URL Validation: Only HTTPS URLs are accepted
security.domainWhitelist: Domain Whitelist: URLs must be from approved domains
security.urlExpiration: URL Expiration: Return URLs expire after 24 hours
security.noStorage: No Data Storage: We don't store your return URLs or user data
